title: Runners Map
summary: Runners map can display map-based information in running, walking, cycling, etc.
description: Runners map can display map-based information in running, walking, cycling, etc.In particular, has been optimized to Below.・android wear (smart watch) like motorola moto360 and SONY smart watch3.・wristwatch-type android terminal like SmartGear49.- Overview -When walking or running or cycling, this app can display routes ,Lap point and the current position on the map.- Other features -・Compatible with voice notificattion. (English and Japanese)・Compatible with Android Wear ( smart watch ).・Compatible with Bluetooth Heart rate monitor. (Android 4.3 or later)・Compatible with Cycling Speed & Cadence sensor. (Android 4.3 or later)・Can customize free the content of Display item.・In Lap browse mode after activity, can display Lap in variety ways.・Can display the remaining time until sunset (or sunrise) in real time.・Can check current weather, tempreture, humidity and etc.・Can import from past records and PC.・Can export to Google Earth and Garmin Connect. (gpx support)- Note -This application uses network communication. packet communications charges will be borne by the customer,Please note.About any damage due to the use of this application,preyukdevelopment can not assume any responsibility.(C) 2015 preyukdevelopment All rights reserved.
descriptionHTML:
Runners map can display map-based information in running, walking, cycling, etc.

In particular, has been optimized to Below.
・android wear (smart watch) like motorola moto360 and SONY smart watch3.
・wristwatch-type android terminal like SmartGear49.

- Overview -
When walking or running or cycling, this app can display routes ,Lap point and the current position on the map.

- Other features -
・Compatible with voice notificattion. (English and Japanese)
・Compatible with Android Wear ( smart watch ).
・Compatible with Bluetooth Heart rate monitor. (Android 4.3 or later)
・Compatible with Cycling Speed & Cadence sensor. (Android 4.3 or later)
・Can customize free the content of Display item.
・In Lap browse mode after activity, can display Lap in variety ways.

・Can display the remaining time until sunset (or sunrise) in real time.
・Can check current weather, tempreture, humidity and etc.
・Can import from past records and PC.
・Can export to Google Earth and Garmin Connect. (gpx support)


- Note -
This application uses network communication.
packet communications charges will be borne by the customer,
Please note.

About any damage due to the use of this application,
preyukdevelopment can not assume any responsibility.

(C) 2015 preyukdevelopment All rights reserved.
comments: Nice idea But UI is pretty terrible
Like it! A very promising app. However, the interface is a little complicated; and there is no instruction available. So, it is difficult for starters to use it.
Good job But,the use was not clear to me,after installation, l could not see my location.
Great ideea. Seems like a nice tool to track my workouts.. but the UI needs more polishing
Great I love  it, useful  for me

Really interesting app for those, who want to have some statistics about their running-/riding-workout. Unfortunately it is missing intructions, which would make it much easier to get started with this app
